attributes.action: reverse the extended tax allowance freeze
attributes.additional_details: i retire 2030 so instantly anybody my age when receiving state pensions will pay tax, low working people are the only loosers, labour promised to end austerity and not tax the working people, we will not forget this betrayal of trust at the next election  labour must reverse this idiotic decision back to its original 2028 date
attributes.background: we demand that government reverse the extended tax allowance freeze back to its original 2028 date  government has lied to the British people, this is a tax on every working person  labour manifesto said end austerity  no tax on the working people,  no rise in national insurance, misleading public

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/749467
